name: Hayami (Justin Ababneh)
description:
Hayami is a collaborative capstone 3D Puzzle Platformer game that is about a young ninja named Keisuke who goes to the land of Yomi to search for the soul of a deceased lover. 

He is then tasked by Izanagi, the god of life and death, in completing a set of tasks in domains owned by other gods.

NOTE: I only worked on this game as the narrative writer, I didn't code or design the levels. That was up to other members of the team.
